programme.title: Hoarders S12
programme.desc: A reality-TV show that features compulsive hoarders--people who are addicted to filling their homes with objects--and how that spills out into their lives. Forrest grew up in the projects and would tell his son stories about a pair of shoes he couldn't afford when he was younger; Forrest is facing extreme financial pressure from daily fines from the Homeowners Association.

programme.title: LEGO Masters USA S2
programme.desc: Imagination, design and creativity come to life when teams of LEGO enthusiasts go head-to-head, with infinite possibilities and an unlimited supply of LEGO bricks. Teams of two compete against each other in brick-building challenges to be crowned the country's most talented amateur LEGO builders.

programme.title: Don't Forget the Lyrics USA S6
programme.desc: The hit music game show is back! Just like in the original version, one contestant must attempt to sing through and fill in the missing lyrics to TEN of the biggest hit songs of all time! But when the music stops, the contestant must correctly provide the missing song lyrics. If a contestant can successfully make it through the first 9 songs without missing a SINGLE lyric, they'll have the chance to play a 10th and final song for a shot at ONE MILLION DOLLARS!

programme.title: Hungry For It
programme.desc: Ten amateur chefs embark on the ultimate crash course in their bid to break into the restaurant business and win the culinary trip of a lifetime. At the end of the series, the winning cook enjoys a round-the-world trip working in some of the industry's most renowned restaurants. The cooks' mentors are grime artist and TV cook Big Zuu, and Kayla Greer, a private chef from LA whose clients includes the singer Justin Bieber.

programme.title: Remarkable Places to Eat S2
programme.desc: In the second series of Remarkable Places To Eat, Britain's best loved foodies take host Fred Sirieix to experience their favourite restaurants and explore what goes into making them so special. Series highlights include a visit to Marrakesh with Andi Oliver, exploring the delights of Vienna with Rachel Khoo and a road trip around Yorkshire with Nadiya Hussain.

programme.title: Patagonia - Series 1
programme.desc: Over six stunning episodes, expert local crews join an international team of the world's best wildlife filmmakers to explore uncharted territory, discover new species and tell an urgent environmental story. Patagonia travels the 2000-mile length and Atlantic-to-Pacific breadth of this vast, enigmatic region to illuminate five distinct terrains: majestic mountains, the far south, dense forests, hostile deserts and breath-taking fjordlands.

programme.title: Supa Strikas
programme.desc: Follow Shakes, Rasta and the rest of the Supa Strikas on their quest to become the world's greatest football team!

programme.title: Beyblade Burst Rise
programme.desc: (Dual Language - English and Malay) Legendary Blader Valt Aoi has been training the next generation of elite Bladers at Spain's BC Sol. One day, rookie Bladers Dante Koryu and Delta Zakuro witness Valt unleashing his newly evolved Gamma Bey, Sword Valtryek. To their surprise, Valtryek radiates a golden light as it rockets around the stadium. Inspired by the limitless possibilities of this Hyper-Flux state, both Dante and Delta seek the same bond with their Beys.

programme.desc: The Wee Littles' stories are about discovery and how they handle their compact size in their own unique and inventive flair. The Wee Littles work together figuring out how to overcome life's little obstacles with imagination, positive support and humour.

programme.desc: Space Nova is an exciting and captivating space adventure which follows the Nova family's search for alien life throughout the universe.

programme.title: Pokemon Journeys: The Series
programme.desc: Pokemon Trainer Ash Ketchum has a new plan: see the world! But first, he and his partner Pikachu are headed to the opening of the Cerise Laboratory, a research facility dedicated to uncovering the mysteries of Pokemon in every region. Ash meets Goh, another boy with boundless curiosity about Pokemon, and both are overjoyed when Professor Cerise asks them to become official research fellows.

programme.title: Talking Point
programme.desc: With 995 emergency ambulances bogged by non-emergency calls, Shrey Bhargava looks into whether we can differentiate between Emergencies vs Non-Emergencies - and what's really at stake here? Talking Point investigates!

programme.title: Kin
programme.desc: Louis goes over James' head and signs a contract that has serious consequences for him. Zaryf has no choice but to reveal his plans to go to medical school to Adina. Matthew thinks Ah Yoke is interested in Dr Shen while Dr Shen thinks otherwise.

programme.title: Jamie's Easy Meals For Every Day
programme.desc: Join Jamie at home with his family in Essex for delicious, family-focused food for real life, every day In this brand new series, we join the nation's favourite chef at his country home, where he's cooking up tasty, healthy recipes from his new book 7 Ways: Easy Ideas for Every Day of the Week. Inspired by his own home cooking, based around simple, crowd-pleasing family meals that are creative but pressure-free, Jamie mostly uses 8 ingredients or less, with plenty of versatility.

programme.title: The Chefs' Line S2
programme.desc: Every top restaurant has a line of chefs leading to the top, from the Commis chef to the Head chef. This celebratory cooking competition pitches at-home cooking enthusiasts against professionals, starting at the bottom and working their way up. Can they beat their way to the top of The Chef's Line?

programme.title: MasterChef Australia S12
programme.desc: Top Australian chefs judge passionate home cooks who participate in competitive culinary challenges to develop their cooking skills and win the title of the best chef. This series involves former high-achieving contestants from the past eleven series of MasterChef Australia, returning for another chance at the title of 'MasterChef' and a prize of A$250,000.

programme.desc: Jimmy and Jenny run a very special bus station - the Sunshine Station! It isn't just a place you go to get to a destination. It is a destination in itself - a destination of endless fun, songs, dances, discovery and wonders! At the Sunshine Station, pre-schoolers embark on a learning journey to discover the world around them by going to various interesting locations around Singapore.

programme.desc: A delightful and heartwarming animated series celebrating the special relationship between an inquisitive girl and her fun and active grandmother.Join JoJo and Gran Gran in their bustling London neighbourhood as they find joy in the everyday - whether it's going on a bike ride, visiting the dentist, or creating a Caribbean-style carnival for their friends.JoJo adores spending time with her energetic Gran Gran, who is always ready with a Gran Gran Plan' when JoJo comes to visit.

Ollie, Cherry and Sloppy are trying to recreate the special Friendship Pie that's been passed down their families for generations. Unfortunately, the final ingredient on the recipe is now illegible.

programme.title: Sleep With Me
programme.desc: Married for 16 years, Peggy and Jason's relationship has hit a middle-age lull. They appear like an average' couple, but beneath the surface, they are struggling with emotional and intimacy issues. Meanwhile, everyone else in their family is also having relationship problems! Sleep With Me is a comedy drama that explores love and marriage through the ups and downs of a multi-generational family.

programme.title: 冀味兒 第三季
programme.desc: 《冀味儿》是首部聚焦燕赵美食的文化纪录片，也是主创团队镜头向下，用平民视角和故事手法聚焦乡野达人，还原美食背后技艺与传承、性格与情感的致敬之作。透过氤氲的美食香气，观众闻得到乡土气息，听得见朴素乡音，窥得着精神气质，品得出淡淡乡愁。乡村、家常、草根、一日三餐。整季地域范围跨度大，重点打造两纵两横美食文化线，滹沱河与燕山横亘东西，太行山并大运河纵横南北，经纬度定位清晰，勾勒出一城一味的燕赵风情.

programme.desc: (PG-些许暴力画面) 全大陆高级魂师学院精英赛决赛后，唐三与小伙伴们依依惜别，他们约定五年后再聚首，随即分头踏上各自的人生道路。武魂殿比比东暗中布局，横扫几大宗门，妄图称霸斗罗大陆。于是唐三集结伙伴们创立唐门，秉持对正义的追求，坚定扛起重任。他们合力勇闯海神岛，对抗武魂殿，不畏黑暗势力和强权，携手维护全大陆和平，匡扶正义，共同成长为不屈不挠的战士。.

programme.desc: (PG-部分画面令人不安) 广达得知罂粟园以及生产鸦片的工厂被烧毁，知道是珍娘所为，愤怒地找她理论。珍娘责备广达私自将广平买来建工厂的地拿去种鸦片，并和黑龙合谋，打算把“伢沙""发现的矿山据为己有。珍娘表示绝不让他胡作非为，广达对珍娘起了杀机。.

programme.title: 信约： 唐山到南洋
programme.desc: (PG) 广达联合秀香的黑道弟弟，将东恩绑走，向张家提出赎金。珍娘非常慌乱，广达答应出面解决，其实是打算向珍娘拿走赎金之后，将东恩杀害，但计谋却被珍娘看穿。朱放屁救出东恩，珍娘对丧心病狂的广达感到痛心不已。.

programme.title: 《伟人不见了！》
programme.desc: (PG) Max 和 Anaka 开始了一场探索北宋大文豪苏轼踪迹的奇妙旅程。他们找到一位华文老师，从宋词中感受苏轼豪放的文采，也发现了他竟然还是个美食家！循着各种蛛丝马迹，Max 在小贩中心“遇见”了苏轼，并邀请他品尝美味的东坡肉。苏轼对这样的安排是否满意？他是否愿意回归书中？.

programme.title: 华文"浆"好玩之时空旅程
programme.desc: 蒋依讲博士（由郑宇容饰演）与蒋慧演助理（由彦维小二饰演）历经多年研发，成功打造出穿越时空的通道。然而，实验突发故障，蒋助理意外坠入未知时空！为了帮助他回到现实世界，蒋博士带领三位小跟班展开一场充满趣味与挑战的华文探索之旅，通过闯关挑战逐步解救蒋助理。.

programme.title: 小团剧

programme.title: 别样人生
programme.desc: 廖思敏是一名食品技术专家。国外念书的经历启发她加入“后巷理发”社会行动计划，与其他志愿者一起为弱势群体提供免费理发服务，希望由此拉近新加坡人与各群体之间的距离。屡获殊荣的摄影师邱加兴与他的团队在冠病阻断措施期间一起开展了一个社区计划，为乐龄人士拍摄肖像照，让他们留下美丽的回忆。.

programme.title: 三把刀

programme.title: 小娘惹
programme.desc: (PG) 故事从30年代展开，横跨70年至现今。黄菊香生于海峡华人（峇峇娘惹）的大家庭，是出生卑微的小姨太之女。大时代的动荡，让菊香饱受折磨，她的丈夫死了，她也死了，留下年纪仅8岁的月娘。二战结束后，逃难到英国的外祖父携家眷回到马来亚，月娘就像当年的母亲一样，被歧视、毒打、折磨，她为了保护外婆，忍辱负重，承受一切的痛苦。月娘被卖给杀猪贩刘一刀当妻子。月娘不甘心自己的一生交由其他人摆弄，宁可结束自己的生命。她刚烈的个性，让刘一刀敬佩，与她结拜为兄妹。月娘决定寻找自己的一条出路，她开始学习做生意，过程中，她被劣人陷害、被驱逐、被打击，但她都一一挺过来，最后重振已衰败的家族生意。.

programme.title: 小娘惹
programme.desc: (PG) 故事从30年代展开，横跨70年至现今。黄菊香生于海峡华人（峇峇娘惹）的大家庭，是出生卑微的小姨太之女。大时代的动荡，让菊香饱受折磨，她的丈夫死了，她也死了，留下年纪仅8岁的月娘。二战结束后，逃难到英国的外祖父携家眷回到马来亚，月娘就像当年的母亲一样，被歧视、毒打、折磨，她为了保护外婆，忍辱负重，承受一切的痛苦。月娘被卖给杀猪贩刘一刀当妻子。月娘不甘心自己的一生交由其他人摆弄，宁可结束自己的生命。她刚烈的个性，让刘一刀敬佩，与她结拜为兄妹。月娘决定寻找自己的一条出路，她开始学习做生意，过程中，她被劣人陷害、被驱逐、被打击，但她都一一挺过来，最后重振已衰败的家族生意。.

programme.desc: 无论生命的长短，灵理心灵辅导师李春英都深信能够在生命的尽头让病患和至亲找到和解。患有罕见病症的19岁青年Danial和49岁的癌末病患Azhar在离别之前和家人分享深藏心底的话。通过深层的对话，李春英将病患和家人的感悟收录在一本本的「生命之书」，让他们的生命留下印记，也为他们的家属带来心灵上的慰藉.
